name: FindABookClub Reading List
author: FindABookClub

sections.description: This simple plugin allows you to add an attractive link to a reading list on https://findabookclub.co.uk.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

Once the plugin is installed, visit the ‘Find A Book Club’ settings page in the ‘Settings’ section of wordpress
and enter your list ID where prompted. This ID is the last part of your reading list web address. So if your
reading list is at the URL “https://findabookclub.co.uk/reading-lists/joe-bloggs” then your list ID would be ‘joe-bloggs’.
Hit save, and from now on, a nice link to your reading list will appear at the bottom of pages on your site.

How to uninstall the plugin?

Simply deactivate and delete the plugin.

short_description: A plugin to add a link to a FindABookClub reading list to your site
description: This simple plugin allows you to add an attractive link to a reading list on https://findabookclub.co.uk.
